help.cmd_setup: Adds a new filter to a filter group
help.cmd_remove: Removes a filter from a filter group
help.cmd_list: Print a list of filter groups
help.cmd_show: Print each rule for each condition of a filter group
help.p_New.Filter.Name: Defines a name of a new filter group
help.p_Filter.Name: Defines a reference to a filter group
help.p_Input: Defines a text to check with condition on the programs input text
